p: With regards to plaintiff type, youth comprised the largest category, followed by government then individuals independent of interest groups. The data concerning defendant type depict an overwhelming majority of cases against governments, with fewer filed against corporations. Nonetheless, when analyzing temporal trends across all cases (not only public health-linked ones), we observed the number filed against corporations increased greatly over the past two years, (7 cases in 2019 and 3 in the first half of 2020, compared to one case in all of 2015).
